abstract: Dallas Mavericks star forward Dirk Nowitzki will throw out ceremonial first pitch in Game 3 of World Series between Texas Rangers and St Louis Cardinals.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki, the Dallas Mavericks’ star forward, will bring his basketball talents to the mound when he throws out the first pitch before Game 3.
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki, the Dallas Mavericks’ star forward, will bring his basketball talents to the mound when he throws out the first pitch before Game 3.

headline.main: A Rangers Fan Who’s Hard to Top
headline.print_headline: A Rangers Fan Who’s Hard to Top
headline.seo: A Rangers Fan Who’s Hard to Top
